name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RingGPT - Manage ChatGPT | Claude | Perplexity Conversations

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage AI conversations: Search, Folders, Favorites, Images, Prompts & Rich Notes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟 RingGPT - AI Chat Management Made Simple 🌟

Organize and search your conversations across ChatGPT, Claude.AI, and Perplexity.AI with powerful management tools. Transform how you manage AI conversations with RingGPT. Save favorite responses, manage custom prompts, and create rich text notes. Never lose important conversations again.

✨ CORE FEATURES

📂 Smart Organization
- Create unlimited folders (Pro)
- Quick navigation sidebar

🔍 Lightning Search
- Real-time search across all conversations
- Quick preview of results

⭐ Favorites & Notes
- Mark important conversations
- Quick access to frequent chats
- Rich text notes with Markdown

🎭 Prompt Management
- Create custom prompts
- Quick-insert prompts

🖼️ Image Management
- View all AI-generated images
- Original prompts preserved
- Export capabilities

🔒 PRIVACY & SECURITY
- Local storage priority
- No conversation data stored on servers

💎 PRICING

🆓 Basic (Free)
💫 Pro ($5/month)
👑 Elite ($99 Lifetime)


🎯 PERFECT FOR
- AI Power Users
- Professionals
- Researchers
- Content Creators
- Students
- Business Users

💡 GET STARTED
1. Install the extension
2. Start organizing!

No signup needed - use your existing ChatGPT/Claude/Perplexity email during checkout.

Contact: admin@ring-gpt.com

⚡ Transform your AI workflow with RingGPT today!
